key.name: cookie
key.description: The cookie value to be used in API requests for authentication. The cookie should be in format: WorkosCursorSessionToken=user_id::jwt_token You can find it in browser devtools after login to cursor.com

key.name: monthly-quota
key.description: The monthly quota limit for API usage. Default is set to 500 requests per month.

key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to check for API usage updates, in seconds. Default is 60 (1 minute).

key.name: debug-mode
key.description: Enable debug logging. When enabled, the extension will output debug information to the system log.

key.name: check-update
key.description: Enable automatic update checking. When enabled, the extension will check for new Cursor app versions every hour.

key.name: trigger-check-update
key.description: A trigger to manually check for updates. This is set to true when the "Check Now" button is clicked.
